body_html:
@eyaler Looks like the python wrapper script is not used in Bazel, from Bazel 0.5.3 we are not using the python script to invoke cl.exe, but for the cuda compiler we still need it.
Please add --action_env=USE_MSVC_WRAPPER=1 to enable it.

As @gunan pointed out, the Cuda build with Bazel is not well tested, so it's not guaranteed to work. But we are working on making it better!
